name: IDACT XSLT Generator
short_description: An automated XSLT generator, which can create the XSLT to transform an XML document into another format.  This work is funded by a NASA Advanced Information Systems Technology (AIST) grant, and is related to the IDACT project (http://idact.uaf.edu/).
